messages.install:
Alpha release of Beyond Reality Farscapes 1.0.3-r1

Farscapes is the first release of our next generation Beyond Reality mod packs for Minecraft Forge 1.11.2.

Note that this is currently at an early release stage.

While, from now-on, no world breaking-changes will be introduced intentionally; lots of mods are alpha versions or custom builds, from unpublished development versions:
Always keep frequent backups of your worlds.

Also note that there is currently no balancing effort yet, as we are waiting for some specific mods and features to be released in this regard.

Issue reports

Please do not contact mod authors for issues when using Farscapes:
Go live chatting your issues with the BeyondReality Team on Discord: https://discord.me/BeyondReality.
Or use our GitHub issues tracker: https://github.com/Beyond-Reality/Beyond-Realty-Farscapes/issues.
messages.update:
Yet another update to Beyond Reality Farscapes

Mod-pack is still an early release.

Be prepared to deal with possible world breaking changes, even if we try to avoid this.

Please consult this changelog or our github commit history for more info.

warnings.warning:
Buildcraft Alpha 7.99

You may experience unstabilities, incompatibilities or straight crashes.

!!! Please be patient or take it on you !!!

Industrial Foregoing

In current version, the Crop Recolector is a significant source of lag on servers.

Server owners:

This mod is not recommended on servers (SMP).

Optifine

While Optifine can greatly enhance Minecraft performance and visuals; keep in mind it also deeply alters its internal functions.

Players using Optifine:

It is possible that Optifine could interfers with other mods in a bad way: causes visual glitches or crashes.

Please do not report issues, bugs, crashes; if it does not happens without Optifine installed!

!!! Always test your issues without Optifine installed !!!

⚠ Realistic Terrain Generation is Alpha 1 ⚠

This is a custom build of the 1.11.2-dev branch of RTG from Team RTG.

Please understand that it is very early and there are still a lot of changes that are going to happen, including breaking changes.

Worlds created with the current state of the repo will not likely be compatible with the proper release when it is ready.

Server Owners, Players:

Select RTG for your world types at your own risks.

Please do not report issues or ask for help to the RTG Team!

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Adds in tons of fancy blocks for decoration, crafted using the Chisel.

mod.description: Adds ore indicator plants, allowing for easier prospecting of COG ore veins.

mod.description: Simple mod that, right-clicking on a wall sign, interacts with the block it's attached to

mod.name: Placeable Items Mod

mod.description: A mod that adds rope bridges to Minecraft. Craft the grappling gun and shoot it over a gap large or small to build a rope bridge across it.

mod.description: Shield Ability Up.

mod.name: Shulkerbox
mod.description: Adds a feature that you can interact with your Shulker Box from your inventory

mod.name: Spartan Shields

mod.description: Adds a (baubles-aware) belt that you can use to hold multiple tools at once.

mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.description: Neat is a mod that adds Unit Frames to the top of every entity.

mod.name: Optifine
mod.description: OptiFine is a Minecraft optimization mod. It allows Minecraft to run faster and look better with full support for HD textures and many configuration options.

mod.description: What's That Slot (WTS) allows you to check what items can be put into hovered slot with a single press of a key!

mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.

mod.description: WorldEdit CUI Forge Edition 2 is a forge client-side user interface for WorldEdit

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.description: Adds over 50 new biomes, blocks, and more!

mod.description: Adds a new world type which generates realistic terrain for Overworld biomes.

mod.description: This mod introduces real flowing rivers, with a true current, to your Minecraft worlds. Compatible with many terrain generators.

mod.name: Resources
mod.description: Custom content for minecraft

mod.name: Structures
mod.description: Custom structure generation

mod.name: MaryTTS
mod.authors: DFKI’s Language Technology Lab, Saarland University
mod.description: MaryTTS is a free and open-source Text-To-Speech synthesizer. This resource provides: The TTS system iteslf, English Language and Voice data files; to enable use of the Speech Box in Computronics. MaryTTS installs on the server; no processing happens on the client side, so clients do not necessarily need it, unless you would like to use the Speech Box on a singleplayer instance.

mod.name: MCMultiPart
mod.description: A universal multipart API for modern Minecraft

mod.name: AutoRegLib
mod.description: Automatically item, block, and model registration for mods.

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.description: Added features for the Beyond Reality ModPacks
